divs: Sighting DetailsThis is a correction to the sighting with all the same information. The sighting occured at 1245, in the year 2004. All the information in the description of the first report is correct. I am very sorry for the inconvience
trends: There has been one other sighting in Majenica
There was one other sighting in Majenica on or around February 14th 2004
